summary: During the reign of Henry VIII, Mary Tudor seeks to flee a forced marriage with the French king by escaping to America with her true love, but her plans are not so easily executed.
cast: Glynis Johns|Richard Todd|James Robertson Justice|Michael Gough|Jane Barrett|Peter Copley|Rosalie Crutchley|D.A. Clarke-Smith|Ernest Jay|John Vere|Philip Lennard|Bryan Coleman|Phillip Glasier|Jean Mercure|Gérard Oury|Fernand Fabre|Robert Le Béal|Gaston Richer|Helen Goss|Patrick Cargill|Anthony Sharp|Caven Watson|Richard Molinas|Hal Osmond|Norman Pierce|Douglas Bradley-Smith|Ewen Solon|Rupert Evans|Paddy Ryan|Thomas Heathcote|Arthur Brander|Russell Waters|John Serret|Bob Simmons|Ernie Rice
keywords: cult favorite|held at swordpoint|men in tights|king|shootout on a beach
title: La espada y la rosa
